trade.body:
Complete Guide to Purchasing 81041 Coin on Bitget
STEP 1: Access and Register Using the Referral Link ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Tap the referral link to open‚ÄúWhen you tap the referral link, you will be taken to the Bitget trading page.Bitget Referral Code: https://partner.bitget.com/bg/D7CVHF‚Äù
Register with your email address or phone number
Set your password
Enter the verification code ‚Üí Registration complete
[Important]By using the referral link, you can trade with a 30% fee rate.
STEP 2: Complete Identity Verification After Logging In ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
My Page ‚Üí Identity Verification
Submit identification(Passport, driver‚Äôs license, etc.)
Facial verification
Wait for approval (usually a few minutes to several hours)
[Point]Identity verification is required for later trading.Please complete it as early as possible.
STEP 3: Press ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù from the Home Screen ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Home Screen ‚Üí Click the ‚ÄúDeposit‚Äù button‚ÄúDisplay Step3 image‚Äù
STEP 4: Select ‚ÄúSOL‚Äù as the Currency (Not USDT) ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Click the ‚ÄúSelect Currency‚Äù field‚ÄúDisplay Step4 image‚Äù
Enter ‚ÄúSOL‚Äù in the search box‚ÄúDisplay Step4-2 image‚Äù
Select SOL
[Note]Be sure to select ‚ÄúSOL‚Äù, not USDT.81041 Coin is a token on the Solana chain.
STEP 5: Select the Network ‚ÄúSOL (Solana)‚Äù ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
On the network selection screen,select ‚ÄúSOL (Solana)‚Äù
‚ÄúDisplay Step5 image‚Äù
[Critical Warning]If you choose the wrong network, the funds will not arrive!Be sure to select ‚ÄúSOL (Solana)‚Äù.
STEP 6: Send SOL from GMO to the Displayed Address ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Copy the displayed addressUse this address to make the transfer.
Send SOL from GMO CoinUsing GMO allows transfers via SOL.Please check GMO‚Äôs trading method yourself.
Once completed, it will be reflected in your Bitget assets.
[Point]If this is your first transfer,we recommend sending a small test amount.
STEP 7: Open ‚ÄúTrade‚Äù ‚Üí ‚ÄúSpot‚Äù ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Tap ‚ÄúTrade‚Äù from the bottom menu‚ÄúDisplay Step7-1 image‚Äù
Tap where it says ‚ÄúBTC/USDT‚Äù‚ÄúDisplay Step7-2 image‚Äù
STEP 8: Search for ‚Äú81041‚Äù from the Market List ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Paste the following Contract Address (CA) into the search boxCA: 9SbNtqtnXbSGKvQv6G1XMzmoiEMNHoNWQNtMz7sbpump (Make it easy to copy)
‚ÄúDisplay Step8-1 image‚Äù
Tap ‚Äú81041coin‚Äù
[Point]Always copy & paste the contract address.Manual entry may cause mistakes.
STEP 9: Purchase 81041coin ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Order Method ‚Üí Select ‚ÄúMarket‚ÄùMarket orders are recommended for beginners‚ÄúDisplay Step9-1 image‚Äù
Enter the amount you want to purchase
Tap the ‚ÄúBuy: 81041‚Äù button
Confirm the order and execute
[Explanation of Order Methods]
‚ñ† Market Order (For Beginners)You can purchase immediately at the current market price.Choose this if you want to buy with certainty.
‚ñ† Limit Order (For Advanced Users)An order to buy when the specified price is reached.Choose this if you want to buy at your desired price.
Confirmation After Purchase ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Tap the ‚ÄúAssets‚Äù tab
Check the amount of 81041 coins you hold
Congratulations!You are now a member of 81041 coin holders.
[Important Notice]By holding long-term, you become eligible for the arrest reward distribution system.Please check the distribution system page for details.
Frequently Asked Questions ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
Q1. Can I send funds from somewhere other than GMO Coin?A1. Yes, it is possible.You can send from any exchange that handles SOL.
Q2. How long does the transfer take?A2. Usually completed within a few minutes to about 10 minutes.It may vary depending on network congestion.
Q3. Is there a minimum purchase amount?A3. It follows Bitget‚Äôs minimum trading amount.Usually purchasable from a few dollars equivalent.
Q4. Where are the purchased coins stored?A4. They are stored in your Bitget wallet.Transfers to external wallets are also possible.
Q5. I sent funds using the wrong network.A5. Unfortunately, if funds are sent to the wrong network,recovery is extremely difficult.Be sure to perform a test transfer before the main transfer.
Important Notes ‚ÄúHeading‚Äù
„ÄêAbout Network Selection„ÄëThe most important thing is selecting the network.Be sure to select ‚ÄúSOL (Solana)‚Äù.Choosing the wrong network will result in loss of funds.
„ÄêRecommendation to Test Transfer„ÄëIf this is your first transfer, be sure to send a small test amountand confirm it arrives correctly before the main transfer.
„ÄêPrivate Key Management„ÄëStrictly manage your account password and private keys.Do not share them or enter them on suspicious websites.
„ÄêInvestment Risk„ÄëCryptocurrency investment involves risk.Always invest with surplus funds and at your own responsibility.
„ÄêDisclaimer„ÄëThis guide is for informational purposes and does not recommend investment.Cryptocurrency investment involves risk.All investment decisions must be made at your own responsibility.
distribution.body:
1. What Is the Arrest Reward?
Purpose of the System
The ‚ÄúArrest Reward‚Äù is a mechanism designed to clearly prioritize long-term holders.
The achievement of our mission is made possible by those who support the project over the long term.This system is a way to return value to those who continue to support us.
This system aims to:
Clearly prioritize long-term holders
Provide strong incentives not to sell
Encourage continued buying as time passes
2. How Is the Reward Pool Accumulated?
The reward pool operates on an accumulation system.
10% of monthly net revenue is allocated to the ‚ÄúArrest Distribution Pool‚Äù
No intermediate distributions
A one-time distribution occurs upon arrest
This means that as time passes, the pool naturally grows, increasing the value of long-term holding.
(Visual: A savings box where coins accumulate month by month.)
3. Eligibility for Distribution
To qualify:
You must hold at least 0.1% of the total supply
Only holders meeting this threshold are eligible for distribution upon arrest.
(Current 0.1% token amount displayed dynamically.)
4. Evaluating ‚ÄúTime‚Äù: Consecutive Holding Coefficient
The core of this system is rewarding consecutive holding duration.
Coefficient Table
1 month: 1.0
2 months: 2.5
3 months: 4.0
4 months: 5.5
5 months: 7.5
6+ months: 10.0
Rules
Monthly snapshot (timing undisclosed)
If at any time the requirement is not met (e.g., dropping below 0.1%), the count resets
Maximum coefficient reached at 6 months
5. Evaluating ‚ÄúAmount‚Äù: Holding Ratio Coefficient
Holding size is also evaluated, but capped to ensure long-term holders benefit more.
(Graph: ‚ÄúHolding Ratio 0.1% ‚Üí 2% coefficient 1 ‚Üí 2‚Äù)
Formula
Holding Coefficient (r):
HoldingCoefficient(r) = 1 + (r - 0.001) / (0.02 - 0.001)
(r = holding ratio, 0.001 = 0.1%, 0.02 = 2%)
Graph Labels
Title:‚ÄúHolding Ratio Coefficient Curve (0.1% ‚Üí 2%)‚Äù
X-axis: Holding Ratio (%)Y-axis: Holding Coefficient
Maximum holding ratio: 2%
Maximum coefficient: 2
Above 2%, coefficient remains 2
This ensures that size alone cannot dominate.
6. How Is the Final Distribution Calculated?
The process is transparent and simple.
Individual Coefficient =Consecutive Holding Coefficient √ó Holding Ratio Coefficient
Individual Share =Individual Coefficient √∑ Total Sum of All Eligible Coefficients
Final Distribution =Distribution Pool √ó Individual Share
7. Why Long-Term Holders Are Favored
Maximum comparison:
Time (Consecutive Holding): 10
Amount (Holding Ratio): 2
Time : Amount = 10 : 2 = 5 : 1
The design is intentional.
Money alone cannot win.The greatest reward goes to those who held the longest.
8. Summary
This system rewards long-term supportersand addresses the structural problem of meme coins being short-lived hype cycles.

This page serves as an archive of our past donations and will be continuously updated.

Use of Donation Funds
The donated funds are planned to be used for the following purposes:
Strengthening the organization‚Äôs operational foundation
Promotion of public awareness and educational activities
Training of crime victim support counselors and enhancement of support systems
Support for crime victims requires continuous organizational development and human resource training.We hope that this donation will contribute to building a system where necessary support reaches those who need it.
report.body:
About This Page
This report page discloses how the funds, calculated based on the revenue and expenses closed at the end of each month, were used during the current month.
Its purpose is to enhance the transparency of project operations and to clearly share our activities with the community.
faq.body:
1. What is 81041?
81041 is a project that redirects the reach of meme culture and crypto communities into real-world impact‚Äîcrime/accident prevention and support for victims. We publish monthly disclosures.
2. Is this a charity?
No. This is a crypto project that allocates part of its net revenue to social impact (e.g., donations) and publicly reports outcomes.
3. What does ‚Äú50% to social impact‚Äù mean?
We aim to allocate 50% of net revenue to victim support and crime/accident prevention. Details are disclosed in monthly reports.
4. How is the rest of revenue used?
Our policy is: Social impact 50%, Operations 40% (development/operations/security), Distribution pool 10% (saved for future payouts under the rules).
5. What does ‚ÄúLive Metrics‚Äù show?
Key indicators such as holders, 24h trades, liquidity, and market cap. Data is fetched from external sources via a relay API and updated at set intervals, with fallbacks if unavailable.
6. Is the market data guaranteed to be accurate?
No. It‚Äôs best-effort reference data and may be delayed or inconsistent. Verify on external sources when needed.
7. How do I buy 81041?
See the Trade Guide (trade-guide.html). Typical flow: get USDT ‚Üí swap to SOL ‚Üí send to an external wallet ‚Üí swap on a DEX using the contract address.
8. Is the referral link/invite code required?
No. It may provide benefits, but it‚Äôs optional.
9. What wallet should I use?
Any Solana-compatible wallet (e.g., Phantom). The key is being able to send/receive on the Solana network.
10. What is the biggest transfer risk?
Selecting the wrong withdrawal network. Always choose Solana and do a small test transfer first.
11. Where can I verify the contract address?
It‚Äôs listed in the Trade Guide. Always confirm the address matches the official one before swapping.
12. What is the ‚ÄúDistribution Pool Balance‚Äù?
It‚Äôs the 81041 balance held in a dedicated wallet reserved for payouts, verifiable on-chain.
13. When does distribution happen?
By design, it‚Äôs a one-time distribution ‚Äúupon arrest.‚Äù No interim distributions. See Distribution System (distribution.html).
14. Who is eligible?
Holding at least 0.1% of total supply is the base requirement. Payout share is calculated using both time-held and holding-size coefficients.
15. What is the consecutive holding coefficient?
A multiplier that rewards uninterrupted holding duration. If you drop below the threshold even once, it resets. Max is 10 at 6+ months.
16. What is the holding ratio coefficient?
A multiplier based on holding size, capped so size alone can‚Äôt dominate. Above 2%, the coefficient remains 2.
17. How is my payout calculated?
Individual coefficient (time √ó size) ‚Üí share of total coefficients ‚Üí multiplied by the distribution pool to determine final payout.
18. What‚Äôs on Results (results.html)?
An archive of social impact records (recipient, amount, date, intended use), with evidence links when available.
19. What‚Äôs on Reports (report.html)?
Monthly summaries of revenue/expenses and allocations (support, operations, saved pool) to increase transparency.
20. Can I donate directly?
Yes. We provide links to official donation pages. If you want to support victims, direct donation is recommended.
21. Where can I submit information about unsolved cases?
We provide links to official public channels. In emergencies, contact local emergency services first.
22. Is this investment advice?
No. This site is informational only. Crypto carries risk, and decisions are your responsibility.
23. Where can I read about the hack/backstory?
The Home prologue summarizes it, and reports may provide further factual updates and actions taken.
24. Where are the official communities?
Use the footer links to official X / Telegram / Discord. Beware of impersonators.
25. Where are Privacy/Terms/Disclaimer?
They‚Äôre linked in the footer: Privacy Policy, Terms of Use, and Disclaimer.
privacy.body:
Last Updated: February 14, 2026
The 81041 Project (hereinafter referred to as "the Project") pays maximum attention to protecting the personal information and privacy of customers (hereinafter referred to as "Users") who use this website (hereinafter referred to as "the Site"). This Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as "this Policy") explains what information the Project collects and how it is used and managed.
1. Information Collected
The Project may collect the following information:
(1) Wallet Addresses
As public information on the blockchain, wallet addresses are used to verify token holdings and operate the distribution system.
(2) Access Logs
Technical information such as IP addresses, browser types, access date/time, referrer URLs, etc. are collected for site operation, improvements, and security measures.
(3) Cookies (Tracking Technologies)
The Site may use cookies to improve user experience and perform statistical analysis. Users can disable cookies in browser settings, but some functions may be limited.
2. Purpose of Use
Collected information is used for the following purposes:
‚Ä¢ Project operation and management
‚Ä¢ Implementation of the distribution system (verification of holdings, identification of eligible recipients, calculation of distribution amounts, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Improvement and optimization of the Site
‚Ä¢ Maintaining and enhancing security
‚Ä¢ Creating and analyzing statistical data
‚Ä¢ User support and inquiry responses
‚Ä¢ Legal compliance
3. Provision to Third Parties
The Project will not provide personal information to third parties except in the following cases:
‚Ä¢ With user consent
‚Ä¢ When disclosure is required by law
‚Ä¢ When necessary to protect life, body, or property and it is difficult to obtain consent
‚Ä¢ When necessary for public health or child welfare and it is difficult to obtain consent
‚Ä¢ When cooperation is required for government agencies or their delegates to perform legally prescribed duties and obtaining consent may impede such duties
4. Use of External Services
The Site may use the following external services. These services have their own privacy policies, so please review each service's policy:
‚Ä¢ Cryptocurrency exchanges (Bitget, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Decentralized exchanges (DEX)
‚Ä¢ Wallet services (Phantom, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Blockchain explorers (Solscan, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Access analytics tools
‚Ä¢ Chart display services
5. Security
The Project will take appropriate security measures to prevent leakage, loss, or damage of collected information. However, please understand that complete security on the internet cannot be guaranteed.
6. Data Retention Period
Collected information will be retained for the period necessary to achieve the purpose of use or as required by law.
7. User Rights
Users have the right to request disclosure, correction, or deletion of their personal information held by the Project. Please contact us through the channels below.
8. Policy Changes
The Project may change this Policy in response to legal changes or service updates. The revised policy will take effect when posted on the Site. Important changes will be announced on the Site.
9. Contact Us
For inquiries regarding this Policy, please contact us through the following official channels:
X (Twitter): https://x.com/Nana27287418
Telegram: http://t.me/yoichi81041coin
Discord: https://discord.gg/62DJS8vUJ
terms.body:
These Terms of Service (hereinafter "these Terms") define the terms and conditions for using this website (hereinafter "the Site") and related services (hereinafter "the Service") provided by the 81041 Project (hereinafter "the Project"). All users (hereinafter "Users") who use the Service are deemed to have agreed to these Terms.
Article 1 (Overview of the Service)
The Service aims to provide information about the token "81041" on the Solana blockchain, trading guides, operation of the distribution system, and reporting on social contribution activities. The Service is primarily for informational purposes and does not recommend specific investment actions.
Article 2 (Terms of Use)
Users must meet the following conditions:
‚Ä¢ Agree to all Terms, Privacy Policy, and Disclaimer
‚Ä¢ Be legally qualified to trade cryptocurrencies in accordance with the laws of their country of residence
‚Ä¢ Use the Service at their own judgment and responsibility
‚Ä¢ Not provide false information
Article 3 (Prohibited Acts)
Users shall not engage in the following acts:
‚Ä¢ Acts that violate laws or public order and morals
‚Ä¢ Acts related to criminal activity
‚Ä¢ Acts that infringe on the rights of the Project, other Users, or third parties
‚Ä¢ Acts that interfere with the operation of the Service
‚Ä¢ Unauthorized access, transmission of computer viruses, etc.
‚Ä¢ Dissemination of false information
‚Ä¢ Commercial activities, advertising, or solicitation using the Service
‚Ä¢ Impersonation of others
‚Ä¢ Involvement in money laundering or other illicit fund transfers
‚Ä¢ Other acts deemed inappropriate by the Project
Article 4 (Intellectual Property Rights)
Copyrights and other intellectual property rights for content (text, images, designs, logos, etc.) posted on the Site belong to the Project or legitimate rights holders. Users may not reproduce, republish, modify, or sell these without permission from the rights holders.
Article 5 (Distribution System)
1. The Project operates the "Arrest Distribution System." Details of this system are described in "Distribution System (distribution.html)" on the Site.
2. The right to receive distributions only arises when the conditions specified in the system are met.
3. Payment of distributions is not guaranteed, and the system may be changed or terminated without notice.
4. Tax treatment regarding distributions is the User's own responsibility.
Article 6 (Risk Acknowledgment)
Users understand and agree that the following risks exist in cryptocurrency trading:
‚Ä¢ Price Volatility Risk: Cryptocurrency prices may fluctuate significantly, potentially resulting in loss of principal
‚Ä¢ Liquidity Risk: Market conditions may prevent trading at desired prices/timing
‚Ä¢ Technical Risk: Losses may occur due to smart contract bugs, hacking, network failures, etc.
‚Ä¢ Regulatory Risk: Changes in national regulations may restrict trading
‚Ä¢ Exchange Risk: Exchange bankruptcy or service suspension may render assets inaccessible
Article 7 (Disclaimer)
For disclaimers regarding use of the Service, please refer to the separate "Disclaimer (disclaimer.html)." The Disclaimer constitutes part of these Terms.
Article 8 (Service Changes, Interruption, Termination)
1. The Project may change, interrupt, or terminate the Service without prior notice to Users.
2. The Project shall not be liable for any damages incurred by Users or third parties due to changes, interruption, or termination of the Service.
Article 9 (Changes to These Terms)
The Project may change these Terms as necessary. Revised Terms shall take effect upon posting on the Site. If Users continue to use the Service after changes, they are deemed to have agreed to the revised Terms.
Article 10 (Severability)
If any provision of these Terms is deemed invalid, the remaining provisions shall continue to be valid.
Article 11 (Governing Law and Jurisdiction)
1. The interpretation and application of these Terms shall be governed by Japanese law.
2. The Tokyo District Court shall have exclusive jurisdiction as the court of first instance for any disputes arising in connection with the Service.
Article 12 (Contact Us)
For inquiries regarding these Terms, please contact us through the following official channels:
X (Twitter): https://x.com/Nana27287418
Telegram: http://t.me/yoichi81041coin
Discord: https://discord.gg/62DJS8vUJ
disclaimer.body:
Disclaimer
Last Updated: February 14, 2026
This Disclaimer defines disclaimers regarding the use of this website (hereinafter "the Site") and related services (hereinafter "the Service") provided by the 81041 Project (hereinafter "the Project"). Please read this carefully before using the Service.
1. Not Investment Advice
Information provided on the Site is for general informational purposes only and does not recommend specific investment actions. Investment decisions should be made at your own responsibility and judgment. The Project is not a financial instruments business operator or investment advisory firm and does not provide investment advice or recommendations.
2. Price Volatility Risk
Cryptocurrency prices may fluctuate significantly due to supply and demand, market conditions, regulatory changes, technical factors, etc. Please understand that you may lose a substantial portion or all of your principal before trading.
3. Technical Risks
The following technical risks exist with cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology:
‚Ä¢ Losses due to smart contract bugs or vulnerabilities
‚Ä¢ Loss of assets due to hacking or cyber attacks
‚Ä¢ Delays or failures in transactions due to network congestion or failures
‚Ä¢ Inability to access assets due to loss of wallet private keys
‚Ä¢ Blockchain forks or specification changes
‚Ä¢ Loss of assets due to incorrect recipient addresses or network selection
The Project shall not be liable for any damages arising from these technical issues.
4. Market Data Accuracy
Market data displayed on the Site (prices, trading volumes, liquidity, holder counts, etc.) are reference information obtained from external sources. This data may contain delays, omissions, or inaccuracies. When making important decisions, verify information from multiple reliable sources.
5. External Services and Links
The Site may provide links to external services such as cryptocurrency exchanges, wallet services, and blockchain explorers. These external services are not operated by the Project, and the Project assumes no responsibility for their content, safety, or reliability. Use of external services is at your own risk.
6. Distribution Disclaimer
1. The "Arrest Distribution System" is based on the Project's operational policy and does not legally guarantee payment of distributions.
2. Distribution payments are made only when the conditions specified in the system are met; distributions may not be paid if conditions are not met or if project continuation becomes difficult.
3. The distribution system may be changed or terminated without notice.
4. Tax treatment regarding receipt of distributions is your own responsibility. The Project does not provide tax advice.
7. Past Performance Does Not Guarantee Future Results
Past price trends, performance, reports, etc., posted on the Site do not guarantee future results. Please understand that past performance does not indicate future performance.
8. Project Continuity
The Project is community-based and does not guarantee future continuation. The project may be interrupted or terminated due to changes in market conditions, regulatory changes, technical issues, operational reasons, etc.
9. Legal Compliance Responsibility
Users are responsible for complying with the laws of their country of residence and related jurisdictions. Cryptocurrency trading may be restricted or prohibited in some countries/regions. Users are responsible for verifying and complying with applicable laws.
10. Limitation of Liability
The Project shall not be liable for the following damages incurred by Users or third parties in connection with use of the Service, regardless of the cause:
‚Ä¢ Direct, indirect, special, incidental, or consequential damages
‚Ä¢ Loss of profits, data, or business opportunities
‚Ä¢ Losses due to cryptocurrency price fluctuations
‚Ä¢ Losses due to failed transactions, incorrect transfers, loss of private keys, etc.
‚Ä¢ Losses due to hacking, unauthorized access, or technical failures
‚Ä¢ Losses due to third-party actions
‚Ä¢ Losses due to Service interruption, termination, or changes
However, this limitation does not apply in cases of willful misconduct or gross negligence by the Project.
11. Information Accuracy
The Project makes no warranties regarding the accuracy, completeness, usefulness, or timeliness of information posted on the Site. Information on the Site may be changed without notice.
12. Security
While the Project strives to ensure security of the Site and Service, complete security cannot be guaranteed. Please understand that security risks always exist with Internet communications and computer systems, and implement appropriate security measures yourself.
13. Changes to This Disclaimer
The Project may change this Disclaimer as necessary. The revised Disclaimer shall take effect upon posting on the Site.
14. Contact Us
For inquiries regarding this Disclaimer, please contact us through the following official channels:
X (Twitter): https://x.com/Nana27287418
Telegram: http://t.me/yoichi81041coin
Discord: https://discord.gg/62DJS8vUJ
Important Notice
Cryptocurrency investments carry high risks. Always invest with surplus funds and within limits that will not affect your livelihood if lost. If you have any uncertainties, please consult with professionals (lawyers, tax accountants, financial advisors, etc.).
vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body:
1. Why a Meme Coin?

Some may wonder, ‚ÄúWhy use cryptocurrency at all? Wouldn‚Äôt direct donations or petitions be enough?‚Äù Indeed, conventional methods have their value. However, modern criminal investigations‚Äîespecially the pursuit of wanted fugitives‚Äîface structural barriers that traditional approaches cannot overcome.

Limitations of Existing Systems

The Absolute Barrier of Overseas Escape
Once a suspect flees abroad, law enforcement options become severely restricted. Physical and legal borders obstruct the realization of justice. International cooperation requires time and cost, and depending on the country of refuge, effective pursuit may become practically impossible.

Public Concern Cannot Be Converted Into Sustained Force
Even when citizens feel strongly about an issue, there are few mechanisms to transform that concern into continuous pressure or actionable support. Petitions gather signatures but rarely lead to sustained action. Donations are temporary, fading as public attention declines. Public will does not translate into lasting impact.

What Only a Meme Coin Can Achieve

Borderless Virality
The spread of meme coins surpasses that of any conventional campaign. Once attention is gained, the coin‚Äôs name and symbol can propagate globally within 24 hours‚Äîacross English-speaking regions, Asia, Europe, and anywhere a fugitive might hide. This scale is unattainable through domestic media or traditional fundraising alone.

Automated, Continuous Funding Flow
Transaction activity generates ongoing fees as long as the project exists. Unlike one-time fundraising campaigns, financial support for victim assistance and information awareness can continue indefinitely. Sustained interest directly becomes sustained funding.

Transparency as the Foundation of Trust
All transactions on the blockchain are publicly verifiable‚Äîanyone, anytime, anywhere.

Low Barrier to Participation
Anyone in the world can join this movement within seconds using only a smartphone. This accessibility enables true global civic collaboration.

A Goal Achievable Only Through This Project
This initiative simultaneously addresses two fundamental challenges in criminal investigations: overseas evasion and the fragmentation of civic engagement. It seeks to create cross-border solidarity and a sustainable support infrastructure that traditional methods could never realize. That is why this project adopts the form of a meme coin.

2. Transforming the Role of Meme Coins

The Structural Problems of Today‚Äôs Meme Coin Market
The current meme coin landscape faces serious issues:

Extreme volatility driven by short-term speculation
Lack of tangible social value
Opaque profit structures benefiting only creators
Communities that disappear after temporary hype

Despite their powerful reach and community-building potential, most meme coins remain entertainment-driven and rarely produce meaningful societal contributions. We confront this problem directly.

The True Potential of Blockchain
Blockchain technology enables complete visibility of financial flows, allowing anyone to verify them independently.

Transparency as a Revolution
This transparency solves a fundamental issue in traditional fundraising: uncertainty about how funds are used. Every transaction is permanently recorded and verifiable in real time by anyone in the world‚Äîan unprecedented level of financial accountability.

Establishing a Replicable Model
We aim to become the first real-world example of combining technology and civic participation to address social challenges. This project demonstrates that digital assets can function not only as speculative instruments but also as effective tools for public good. If successful, this framework can extend to other causes‚Äîunsolved cases, environmental protection, education, medical access‚Äîareas often neglected because they are not profit-driven. It represents a new category: Social Meme Coins.

We believe the viral power of crypto can be used for something more meaningful. When people around the world unite for a shared purpose, that force can influence even governments and large institutions. This is not merely an investment vehicle. It is a movement toward a safer and more just society.

From Meme to Movement

vision.section1.title: 1. Why a Meme Coin?
vision.section2.title: 2. Transforming the Role of Meme Coins
vision.section1.body:
1. Why a Meme Coin?

Some may wonder, ‚ÄúWhy use cryptocurrency at all? Wouldn‚Äôt direct donations or petitions be enough?‚Äù Indeed, conventional methods have their value. However, modern criminal investigations‚Äîespecially the pursuit of wanted fugitives‚Äîface structural barriers that traditional approaches cannot overcome.

Limitations of Existing Systems

The Absolute Barrier of Overseas Escape

trade.gallery.title: Step Images
trade.section1.title: STEP 1: Access and Register Using the Referral Link
trade.section1.body:
• Tap the referral link to open
  • Register with your email address or phone number
  • Set your password
  • Enter the verification code ‚Üí Registration complete
  • [Important]By using the referral link, you can trade with a 30% fee rate.
trade.section2.title: STEP 2: Complete Identity Verification After Logging In
trade.section2.body:
• My Page ‚Üí Identity Verification
  • Submit identification(Passport, driver‚Äôs license, etc.)
  • Facial verification
  • Wait for approval (usually a few minutes to several hours)
  • [Point]Identity verification is required for later trading.Please complete it as early as possible.
trade.section3.title: STEP 3: Press  from the Home Screen
trade.section3.body: • Home Screen ‚Üí Click the button
trade.section4.title: STEP 4: Select  as the Currency (Not USDT)
trade.section4.body:
• Click the field
  • Enter in the search box
  • Select SOL
  • [Note]Be sure to select , not USDT.81041 Coin is a token on the Solana chain.
trade.section5.title: STEP 5: Select the Network
trade.section5.body:
• On the network selection screen,select
  • [Critical Warning]If you choose the wrong network, the funds will not arrive!Be sure to select .
trade.section6.title: STEP 6: Send SOL from GMO to the Displayed Address
trade.section6.body:
• Copy the displayed addressUse this address to make the transfer.
  • Send SOL from GMO CoinUsing GMO allows transfers via SOL.Please check GMO‚Äôs trading method yourself.
  • Once completed, it will be reflected in your Bitget assets.
  • [Point]If this is your first transfer,we recommend sending a small test amount.
trade.section7.title: STEP 7: Open  ‚Üí
trade.section7.body:
• Tap from the bottom menu
  • Tap where it says
trade.section8.title: STEP 8: Search for  from the Market List
trade.section8.body:
• Paste the following Contract Address (CA) into the search boxCA: 9SbNtqtnXbSGKvQv6G1XMzmoiEMNHoNWQNtMz7sbpump (Make it easy to copy)
  • Tap
  • [Point]Always copy & paste the contract address.Manual entry may cause mistakes.
trade.section9.title: STEP 9: Purchase 81041coin
trade.section9.body:
• Order Method ‚Üí Select Market orders are recommended for beginners
  • Enter the amount you want to purchase
  • Tap the button
  • Confirm the order and execute
  • [Explanation of Order Methods]
  • ‚ñ† Market Order (For Beginners)You can purchase immediately at the current market price.Choose this if you want to buy with certainty.
  • ‚ñ† Limit Order (For Advanced Users)An order to buy when the specified price is reached.Choose this if you want to buy at your desired price.
trade.section10.title: Confirmation After Purchase
trade.section10.body:
• Tap the tab
  • Check the amount of 81041 coins you hold
  • Congratulations!You are now a member of 81041 coin holders.
  • [Important Notice]By holding long-term, you become eligible for the arrest reward distribution system.Please check the distribution system page for details.
trade.section11.title: Frequently Asked Questions
trade.section11.body:
Q1. Can I send funds from somewhere other than GMO Coin?
A1. Yes, it is possible.You can send from any exchange that handles SOL.
Q2. How long does the transfer take?
A2. Usually completed within a few minutes to about 10 minutes.It may vary depending on network congestion.
Q3. Is there a minimum purchase amount?
A3. It follows Bitget‚Äôs minimum trading amount.Usually purchasable from a few dollars equivalent.
Q4. Where are the purchased coins stored?
A4. They are stored in your Bitget wallet.Transfers to external wallets are also possible.
Q5. I sent funds using the wrong network.
A5. Unfortunately, if funds are sent to the wrong network,recovery is extremely difficult.Be sure to perform a test transfer before the main transfer.
trade.section12.title: Important Notes
trade.section12.body:
• „ÄêAbout Network Selection„ÄëThe most important thing is selecting the network.Be sure to select .Choosing the wrong network will result in loss of funds.
  • „ÄêRecommendation to Test Transfer„ÄëIf this is your first transfer, be sure to send a small test amountand confirm it arrives correctly before the main transfer.
  • „ÄêPrivate Key Management„ÄëStrictly manage your account password and private keys.Do not share them or enter them on suspicious websites.
  • „ÄêInvestment Risk„ÄëCryptocurrency investment involves risk.Always invest with surplus funds and at your own responsibility.
  • „ÄêDisclaimer„ÄëThis guide is for informational purposes and does not recommend investment.Cryptocurrency investment involves risk.All investment decisions must be made at your own responsibility.
distribution.section1.title: 1. Purpose of the System
distribution.section1.body:
The success of this project requires the long-term support of investors.
When this project is achieved, all coins held by the management will be returned to the holders who have supported us so far.
The longer the resolution takes, the more the distribution pool accumulates. By adding incentives based on holding duration, we encourage continuous growth of the coin and accelerate project completion.
distribution.section2.title: 2. How Are the Rewards Funded?
distribution.section2.body:
The reward source is an accumulation model.
Each month, 10% of revenue is allocated to the "Arrest-Time Distribution Pool".
No interim distributions are made.
In other words, the pool increases as time passes.
distribution.section3.title: 3. Eligibility for Receiving Distribution
distribution.section3.body:
To qualify for distribution at the time of arrest:
A holder must continuously maintain at least 0.1% of the total supply
Only those who meet this threshold are eligible for rewards.
distribution.section4.title: 4. Incentive for Long-Term Holding
distribution.section4.body:
The core of this system is that it evaluates how many consecutive months tokens are held.
Coefficient Table (Holding Duration)
1 month1.0
2 months2.5
3 months4.0
4 months5.5
5 months7.5
6+ months10.0

Rules:
Holdings are checked via a monthly snapshot (timing not fixed)
If the requirement is not met even once (e.g., balance drops below 0.1%), the count resets
The maximum coefficient is reached at 6 months (10.0)
distribution.section5.title: 5. Incentive for Large Holdings (With Limits)
distribution.section5.body:
We also provide incentives for large holders.
‚Ä¢ When the holding rate is 0.1%, the coefficient is 1.
‚Ä¢ When the holding rate is 2%, the coefficient becomes 2.
‚Ä¢ Between 0.1% and 2%, it increases linearly.
‚Ä¢ Above 2%, the coefficient stays capped at 2.
‚Ä¢ Large holders gain some advantage, but it is capped at the upper limit.
distribution.section6.title: 6. How Is the Final Distribution Calculated?
distribution.section6.body:
The distribution process is highly transparent and based on a simple formula combining:
Holding duration coefficient
Holding ratio coefficient
Share of the total distribution pool
distribution.section7.title: 7. Example: Why Long-Term Holding Wins
distribution.section7.body:
At maximum values:
Time (duration coefficient): 10
Size (holding coefficient): 2
This creates a weighting of:
Time : Size=10:2=5:1
The intention is clear:Capital alone cannot dominate.Those who hold the longest receive the greatest reward.
distribution.section8.title: 8. Summary
distribution.section8.body:
This initiative:
Rewards holders who have supported the project long-term
Addresses the reality that meme coins often end as short-lived hype
Creates a structure designed to build sustained commitment rather than temporary speculation

results.intro.title: About Our Initiatives
results.intro.body: This project carries out donation activities as a concrete action to address social issues.We are committed to maintaining transparency by publicly disclosing our donation records and how the funds are used.
results.intro.sub: This page serves as an archive of our past donations and will be continuously updated.
results.archive.title: 1st Donation Record
results.archive.recipient.label: ‚ñ† Recipient
results.archive.recipient.value: National Association for Crime Victim Support (Public Interest Incorporated Association)
results.archive.amount.label: ‚ñ† Donation Amount
results.archive.date.label: ‚ñ† Date of Donation
results.detail.title: 1st Donation Record
results.detail.use.title: Use of Donation Funds
results.detail.use.lead: The donated funds are planned to be used for the following purposes:
results.detail.use.items:
• Strengthening the organization‚Äôs operational foundation
  • Promotion of public awareness and educational activities
  • Training of crime victim support counselors and enhancement of support systems
results.detail.use.note: Support for crime victims requires continuous organizational development and human resource training.We hope that this donation will contribute to building a system where necessary support reaches those who need it.
